ygData.subject: RE: Another question about the new armor quests
ygData.msgSnippet: The Hero Bracer is far better than the Lambent bracer in my opinion, that is if you are of the size race who can wear it, but it is lore so I see myself
ygData.messageBody:
The Hero Bracer is far better than the Lambent bracer in my opinion, that is
if you are of the size race who can wear it, but it is lore so I see myself
wearing a combination of 1 hero bracer and 1 lambent for a combined total AC
and bonuses of AC18 STR+14 CHA+1 DIS+10 POI+10 WT6.5 just for 2 bracers!

Just something else to consider if any of you half-elf or hummie bards have
not thought of it yet.

-Faras

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
> [mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
> Sent: Thursday, October 14, 1999 11:54 AM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Another question about the new armor quests
>
>
> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> yes i completed it as well with the same result, i will be
> talking to our
> server GM this afternoon. a few other bards around have
> reported the same
> thing. on the other hand, i still want to know how there is
> more than one
> gypsy lute that comes from mistmoore =)
>
> Shada
> >
> > From: David Knadler <dknadler@...>
> >
> > As an aside... On the "Concert Hall" message board, a fellow
> > bard attempted
> > to complete the quest for the Lambent Breastplate (the one
> > the requires the
> > lute and the carapace?). Anyway, he forked over his Lute,
> > carapace and
> > required stone, and got absolutely nothing in return. Either
> > the quest is
> > broken, or the Lute of the Gypsy Princess is NOT the correct
> > lute to use.
> >
> > Desmei Sightblinder
> > Lvl 30 Bard (Povar)
